Entities.Name: Housing Stability
Entities.Definition: References to the patient's living situation and stability of housing.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient mentions difficulty maintaining permanent housing.

Entities.Name: Employment
Entities.Definition: Employment status and conditions related to the patient's job.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient is currently unemployed and seeking work.

Entities.Name: Education
Entities.Definition: Level of education attained by the patient and any ongoing educational activities.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient completed high school and is currently attending community college.

Entities.Name: Food Security
Entities.Definition: Access to and availability of sufficient food for the patient.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient reports skipping meals regularly due to financial constraints.

Entities.Name: Economic Stability
Entities.Definition: Financial status and stability, including income and financial barriers to healthcare.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient has recently filed for bankruptcy.

Entities.Name: Social Support
Entities.Definition: Presence of a support system, family, friends, or community aid.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient lives alone and expresses feelings of isolation.

Entities.Name: Transportation
Entities.Definition: Access to transportation for healthcare visits and daily activities.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient has no personal vehicle and relies on public transport.

Entities.Name: Anxiety
Entities.Definition: Mentions of anxiety symptoms, diagnoses, or treatments.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient reports experiencing increased anxiety, especially in social settings.

Dataset.Name: Clinical notes for cLBP patients
Dataset.Details: The dataset includes notes annotated for various social determinants of health, captured from an urban academic medical center.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: No specific URL provided in the document. The guidelines are likely internal or proprietary to the institution.
